name: Idle Run
description:
Description

"Idle Run" is a mix between an Endless Runner and an Idle clicker. You start off by gaining $1 each time you jump. Buy upgrades to boost your income.

This game was made in 10 hours for "Mini Jam 71".

Controls

Space to Jump.

Click the shop icon at the top left to buy upgrades.

Credits

Henry Turbedsky
